subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Dhani Jones, a former Giants linebacker who started for the Eagles last season but then was waived after last spring’s draft, said he intended to sign with New Orleans. Jones, 29, discussed his decision while being interviewed on the NFL Network. A Saints spokesman did not immediately respond to a message.
